p: The CPV genome is approximately 5.2 kb in length, and contains two open reading frames (ORF), which encode 2 nonstructural proteins (NS1 and NS2) and two structural proteins (VP1 and VP2) [ 4, 5, 6]. After the emergence of CPV-2 in the late 1970s, CPV-2 and its variants have been reported in several countries and distributed among five continents [ 7].
